name: Marian the Avenger alpha
description: Marian the Avenger is open world rpg game whose action is based on the fictional planet Marian from the Marian comics. The story is a sequel to the comic book, but briefly, after a successful career, Marian returned to his native hometown with his assistant called Super Sprint. At one point, only the earth trembled and the army of Marian's greatest enemy, Doctor Peter Z Mstic, appeared. Mastic attacked the planet Marian to seek revenge on Marian for defeating him. But Masic fails to kill Marian but his son. Marian has sworn revenge and will destroy Peter and his evil. And that's the action that will take place in the game .But it has to be said that you will not be able to see parts of this story here because this is only an alpha version and the full version comes out on 4/28/20
